content:
Following up on the discussion here, I wonder if we could improve the user group deletion confirmation modal.

Screen-Shot-2022-07-26-at-10.44.18-AM.png

We could change it to something like:

Delete hamletcharacters?

[some explanation of what that entails]
Is there anything interesting to note about the implications of deleting a group? I noticed that hovering over an @-mention for the group no longer shows a list of users.
If we don't have something meaningful to say, I guess "This action cannot be undone." is an option.
Yeah I'd just add a sentence about how it's irreversible.

Generally we have been trying to avoid repeating the name twice in these modals, since it often doesn't look good and creates more things that can go wrong with i18n or long names. I think your proposal is pretty good on that front (moving the name to the heading).
(Though it may have downsides in places where we might want to decorate the name with an icon, since doingb that inside headings can be more annoying to make look good.)
Filed Improve wording of the "Delete user group" confirmation modal #22593.
